data:
## type alias_ExtendWidgetAdaptSlotContentProps
> **ExtendWidgetAdaptSlotContentProps**\<`Props`, `ExtraProps`, `ExtraDirectives`\> = `Props` *extends* [`WidgetSlotContext`](../types#widgetslotcontext)\<infer U\> ? [`WidgetSlotContext`](../types#widgetslotcontext)\<[`ExtendWidgetProps`](#extendwidgetprops)\<`U`, `ExtraProps`, `ExtraDirectives`\>\> & [`Omit`](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/utility-types.html#omittype-keys)\<`Props`, keyof [`WidgetSlotContext`](../types#widgetslotcontext)\<`any`\>\> : `Props`


Type to adapt the slot content properties of a widget by extending its props, extra props, and extra directives.

### Type Parameters

#### Props

`Props` *extends* [`Record`](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/utility-types.html#recordkeys-type)\<`string`, `any`\>

The original properties of the widget slot context.

#### ExtraProps

`ExtraProps` *extends* `object`

Additional properties to extend the widget slot context.

#### ExtraDirectives

`ExtraDirectives` *extends* `object`

Additional directives to extend the widget slot context.

### Remarks

This type conditionally checks if `Props` extends `WidgetSlotContext` and, if so, extends the widget slot context
with additional properties and directives while omitting the original widget slot context properties.

## type alias_ExtendWidgetAdaptSlotWidgetProps
> **ExtendWidgetAdaptSlotWidgetProps**\<`Props`, `ExtraProps`, `ExtraDirectives`\> = `ExtraProps` & `{ [K in keyof Props]: IsSlotContent<Props[K]> extends SlotContent<infer U> ? SlotContent<ExtendWidgetAdaptSlotContentProps<U, ExtraProps, ExtraDirectives>> : Props[K] }`


Type definition for extending widget properties with additional properties and directives.

This type takes three generic parameters:
- `Props`: The original properties of the widget.
- `ExtraProps`: Additional properties to be merged with the original properties.
- `ExtraDirectives`: Additional directives to be merged with the original properties.

The resulting type combines `ExtraProps` with the original `Props`. For each property in `Props`,
if the property is of type `SlotContent`, it will be extended with the additional properties and directives.

### Type Parameters

#### Props

`Props`

The original properties of the widget.

#### ExtraProps

`ExtraProps` *extends* `object`

Additional properties to be merged with the original properties.

#### ExtraDirectives

`ExtraDirectives` *extends* `object`

Additional directives to be merged with the original properties.

## type alias_ExtendWidgetInterfaces
> **ExtendWidgetInterfaces**\<`Interfaces`, `ExtraInterfaces`\> = `Interfaces` & `ExtraInterfaces`


Combines two interface types into a single type.

### Type Parameters

#### Interfaces

`Interfaces`

The base interface type.

#### ExtraInterfaces

`ExtraInterfaces`

The additional interface type to extend the base interface.

## function_extendWidgetProps
> **extendWidgetProps**\<`W`, `ExtraProps`, `ExtraDirectives`\>(`factory`, `extraPropsDefaults`, `extraPropsConfig?`, `overrideDefaults?`): [`WidgetFactory`](../types#widgetfactory)\<[`ExtendWidgetProps`](#extendwidgetprops)\<`W`, `ExtraProps`, `ExtraDirectives`\>\>


Method to extend the original widget with extra props with validator

### Type Parameters

#### W

`W` *extends* [`Widget`](../types#widget)\<`object`, `object`, `object`, `object`\>

The type of the widget.

#### ExtraProps

`ExtraProps` *extends* `object`

The type of the additional properties.

#### ExtraDirectives

`ExtraDirectives` *extends* `object` = `object`

The type of the additional directives (default is an empty object).

### Parameters

#### factory

[`WidgetFactory`](../types#widgetfactory)\<`W`\>

original widget factory

#### extraPropsDefaults

`ExtraProps`

object containing default value for each extra prop

#### extraPropsConfig?

[`ConfigValidator`](../types#configvalidator)\<`ExtraProps`\>

object verifying the type of each extra prop

#### overrideDefaults?

[`Partial`](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/utility-types.html#partialtype)\<[`WidgetState`](../types#widgetstate)\<`W`\>\>

object overriding some default props of the widget to extend

### Returns

[`WidgetFactory`](../types#widgetfactory)\<[`ExtendWidgetProps`](#extendwidgetprops)\<`W`, `ExtraProps`, `ExtraDirectives`\>\>

widget factory with the extra props

## type alias_ExtendWidgetProps
> **ExtendWidgetProps**\<`W`, `ExtraProps`, `ExtraDirectives`\> = [`Widget`](../types#widget)\<[`ExtendWidgetAdaptSlotWidgetProps`](#extendwidgetadaptslotwidgetprops)\<[`WidgetProps`](../types#widgetprops)\<`W`\>, `ExtraProps`, `ExtraDirectives`\>, [`ExtendWidgetAdaptSlotWidgetProps`](#extendwidgetadaptslotwidgetprops)\<[`WidgetState`](../types#widgetstate)\<`W`\>, `ExtraProps`, `ExtraDirectives`\>, `W`\[`"api"`\], [`ExtendWidgetInterfaces`](#extendwidgetinterfaces)\<`W`\[`"directives"`\], `ExtraDirectives`\>\>


Type extending the original Widget props and state with ExtraProps

### Type Parameters

#### W

`W` *extends* [`Widget`](../types#widget)

The base widget type to be extended.

#### ExtraProps

`ExtraProps` *extends* `object`

Additional properties to be added to the widget.

#### ExtraDirectives

`ExtraDirectives` *extends* `object` = `object`

Additional directives to be added to the widget. Defaults to an empty object.
